pages.text:
About
Welcome to DogManic Productions and Recording Studios:
South Florida’s Most Diverse Audio Production and AV Facility.
DogManic’s goal has always been to deliver the most engaging and sonically perfect Recordings.
All projects that come through our door are treated uniquely, starting with the pre-production meetings, through recording, editing & mixing, to the final production stages.
Our staff of Engineers has been specifically vetted for their diverse talents and decades of experience.
DogManic’s team of passionate producers have worked with headlining Solo Artists, Bands,
and leading Film & TV Studios, earning our reputation in the industry.
We invite you to tour our we
bsite to review our work, our clients, reviews and everyth
ing DogManic.
We are sure you will fi
nd what you're
looking for.
Follow these links for a deeper look into our
MUSIC
,
ADR & VO
,
COMMERCIAL CLIENTS
,
DOLBY ATMOS
,
VIDEO PRODUCTION SERVICES
,
ARTISTS,
and Everything DogManic Productions & Recording Studios !
CLIENT HIGHLIGHTS & REVIEWS
Studio Tour
STUDIO TOUR
STUDIO A w/ ATMOS
Sonically Tuned for Pure Transparency while Recording, Mixing, and Mastering
Designed for Stereo, Binaural, 5.1, and 7.1.4 Mixing
LIVE ROOM
Our Custom-Designed & Acoustically Treated Live Tracking Room
STUDIO B w/ ATMOS
ISO BOOTH
Studio-B also supports the World of ATMOS.
Equipped for Recording, Editing, Mixing, and Production
for both our Audio and Video Departments.
​
​
( Call us about our Control Room B rental rates )
Team
TEAM
Christian Solazzo
CEO of DogManic Productions & Recording Studios.
Producer/ Music & Film
Christian brings over 40 years of experience in the music industry.
With a Rich History in live performing,
recording or producing his full array of talent falls into the fray of the studio on a daily basis.
Wether producing the studio’s musical artists or supervising ADR & VO sessions for our commercial clients,
Christian’s passion for their projects is unbeatable.
He shares his knowledge in the audio recording and audio visual arenas
to ensure that all our clients get a first class professional product .
His passion for the arts is evident in his hands on approach
and detailed contribution to every project that comes through DogManic’s doors.
Anthony 'Alf' Alfonso
Recording, Mix and
Mastering Engineer
Music & Beat Producer
Anthony Alfonso, known professionally as Alf, is a music producer, audio engineer, and DJ based in South Florida, deeply rooted in Costa Rican heritage.
Renowned for his expertise in reggaeton, EDM, and pop music, Alf has carved out a niche in the industry utilizing his unique blend of production. His work seamlessly molds rhythmic influences from his Latin background with underground electronic beats, creating a fresh and vibrant take on new music.
Whether it's music or post-production audio, Alf's versatile ear has established him as a rising figure in the world of modern audio.
Gabriel A. Alvarez
Franchi
ATMOS Engineer & Producer
Recording, Mix and
Mastering Engineer
Gabriel is a major asset to our team. He has 20+ years of experience in the Music & Film industries. He has strengths in audio recording, editing, mixing, mastering, ATM
OS engineering, and production. All which have put him in high demand by clients from around the globe.
​
Gabriel is a 3x Emmy Award Winner for his DOLBY Atmos mix of
“The Night Doctrine”  documentary.
He is also a Latin Grammy Nominee
and is also a voting member for The Latin Grammy Recording Academy®.
​
Click Here for Gabriel’s Extended Bio & Previous Work
David Zuluaga
Music Producer, Pianist, Songwriter
2018 (Best Latin Children’s Album) Latin Grammy Awards Winner, 5x Latin Grammy Awards Nominee, 10 India Catalina Prizes, 3 Produ Awards, 2 El Dorado Prizes.
Over the years, his musical career has been on the rise, and he has also developed as a producer, composer, arranger, and session pianist for radio and television advertising campaigns.
Likewise, he has accompanied as a pianist in television performances of David Bisbal, Diego Torres, Andrés Cepeda, Maluma, Fanny Lu, Gilberto Santa Rosa, and Ricardo Montaner.
Another of his achievements was the co-production and recording of pianos of the single "Dance with Me", produced by Andres Upegui, a song with which the artist Lian D represented Colombia at the 2015 Viña del Mar Festival.
David worked as assistant voice editor for the album "Miénteme, prométeme" by the Colombian band Don Tetto, nominee for the Latin Grammy 2011, in the category of "Best Rock Vocal Duo or Group Album", produced by the renowned Jorge Holguín "Pyngwi". He has stood out as a pianist, producer for the television shows "La Reina del Flow" ("The Queen of Flow" on Netflix), "El Hijo del Cacique" and musical director in "Amar y Vivir" ("All for Love" on Netflix) on the Caracol Televisión channel.
David has become a very popular music producer, because of his extraordinary ability, talent and versatility. Nowadays he is working as a Record Producer for international well-known artists/singers-songwriters in Guatemala, Mexico, Colombia, and Spain.
BACK TO TOP

audio-visual, Dolby Atmos mixing, or professional ADR & Voiceover services...
